thread.title: Katie Holmes Shows Us the True Darkness of Fame
thread.title_full: Katie Holmes Shows Us the True Darkness of Fame -- The Cut

author: Dayna Evans
title: Katie Holmes Shows Us the True Darkness of Fame
text:
Magical!
Katie Holmes, presumably for a photo shoot, was captured dressed in a red ball gown and heels boarding a train at Penn Station. Every New Yorker is deeply aware of the psychological damage that passing through Penn Station for even one minute can inflict. That is — every New Yorker but Katie Holmes .
Heels and a train...nothing better #newyork #pennstation
Girl. You are a highly recognizable movie and TV star with a fancy penthouse in Chelsea. Can you really think of nothing better than boarding a train at Penn Station in heels?
